books.title: A Mathematical Introduction to Logic
author: Herbert B. Enderton
books.description: Rigorous mathematical treatment of propositional and first-order logic, including completeness and compactness theorems.
books.why_read: The clearest and most precise introduction to mathematical logic at the graduate level.
